title: Omiai Aite Wa Oshiego, Tsuyoki Na, Mondaiji.
alternative_title: My Matchmaking Partner Is My Student and a Troublemaker ; お見合い相手は教え子、強気な、問題児。 ; 相親物件是我的強硬問題兒學生 ; 老師的相親對象竟然是、學校的、壞學生。 ; 맞선 상대는 제자,기가 센, 문제아
status: My Matchmaking Partner Is My Student and a Troublemaker ; お見合い相手は教え子、強気な、問題児。 ; 相親物件是我的強硬問題兒學生 ; 老師的相親對象竟然是、學校的、壞學生。 ; 맞선 상대는 제자,기가 센, 문제아
description:
Description :
        The two are female teacher and her student but they are Engaged! Nano is a popular teacher who is admired by students. Only Souji, a male student, gives her trouble. One day, someone she knows introduced her for an arranged marriage. Nano is worried at first, but later became frank with the man who she meets and is in a good mood. Later she realized that the man is Souji disguised as someone else! Even though she rejects the arranged marriage, Souji still comes to pursuit her. Will Nano, the Serious teacher, be able to reject Souji's love?
